metadata.title: CVE-2016-9776 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) built with the ColdFire Fast Ethernet Controller emulator support is vulnerable to an infinite loop issue. It could occur while receiving packets in 'mcf_fec_receive'. A privileged user/process inside guest could use this issue to crash the QEMU process on the host leading to DoS.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu2').
